mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Raggi, Giacomo
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Wants $100 sent to New York to enable him to depart for Italy to fulfill the commission of the University; Would not have troubled him had he been able to sell his sculptures in Richmond; Spoke to Dr. Brockenbrough who promised to remit $100 but has not done it.
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Brockenbrough, John, 1774-1852
Jefferson, Thomas, 1743-1826--Correspondence
mdRecord.dcterms:title: Letter, 1823 October 13, Balt[im]o[re], [Maryland], to [Thomas Jefferson], n.p.
